snippet.title: The Art of Reflection | Old Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2290770/The_Art_of_Reflection/

Exploit mirrors to solve puzzles and perform gravity-shifting acrobatics in The Art of Reflection. Unfold complex reflected paths into straight lines as you jungle-gym your way through a sprawling environment. You'll never look in a mirror the same way again.

The Art of Reflection is a first-person puzzle game that explores mirrors as if they were natural extensions of space. What if you could pass through a mirror and walk around in mirror-land? And when you did, some objects weren't reflected? What if gravity wasn't either? Reshape your perspective to unfold complex reflected paths and navigate this world with mastery.
